Text:
Well, I hope you buy this DVD to support the band if you really like it ?! ;)

However, if you're lucky, I'll upload it next week ...

What progarm should i use to open it?
downs't work with realplayer or maybe i just don't knoiw how to do it
Use VLC and open the directory (not some file), this should work
I got the VLC player and the file works perfectly fine. I was just curious as to what I need to do to be able to burn the files to DVD using ConvertXtoDVD. Thanks in advance.

ConvertXtoDVD can be used to convert arbitrary movie files (AVI, MPG, ...) to DVD format.
Since you already got VOB-files (which are DVD format), you only need to put these files on a DVD. If you're using some good enough software (Nero, k3b etc.) it should provide a function for burning VOBs to DVD.
